vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.deposit (patch_1.sol#13-18):
	External calls:
	- transferLog.addMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_1.sol#16)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_1.sol#17)
